Quoth Mike Clark:
  [...]
> I'm responsible for letting this message through.  I approved it.  Being 
> a moderator is always a little tricky.  If I err, it's on the side of 
> not censoring enough.  [...]
> In the meantime, I'm putting myself on notice...

Imho, there's no need to consider this a moderation error; the
post was on topic.  Normal social processes within the group can
handle the occasional excessive rudeness.  That is, those of us
who wish to can ostracize the OP by filtering out their posts, not
answering their questions, issue reproaches for the rudeness and
hope they learn (as we have been doing), etc..

This holds for occasional rudenesses; flame war threads are a
different matter, and may deserve moderator intervention.

My two zorkmids.

> I, for one, consider this community very fortunate to have J.B. as a 
> volunteer.  Indeed, I place a high value on his insights and 
> contributions. [...]

Me too.  Amen!  Sing it, brother!

--
